column2: BRIEF-Marcus & Millichap Files Prospectus Relating To Resale Or Other Disposition By Phoenix Investments Holdings Llc May 10 (Reuters) - Marcus & Millichap Inc: * MARCUS & MILLICHAP FILES PROSPECTUS RELATES TO RESALE OR OTHER DISPOSITION BY PHOENIX INVESTMENTS HOLDINGS LLC OF UP TO 2 MILLION SHARES OF CO'S COMMON STOCK Source text: (bit.ly/2KQc8jS) Further company coverage:
